entry.title: Deployment D1
entry.summary:
First week landing on project Unibotics
This first week I’ve started from the basics following the documentation provided by my peers to deploy the webserver locally as to get used to its architecture, directories, database and overall functionality due to the many new technologies I’m working with for the first time. From WSL2, which was the hardest part starting with a clean copy and was onl...
